content: falcon pattern thanks for taking the time to check out this pattern feel free to sell the �nished products but pleasedo not sell the pattern itself or distribute it inany way 😊 i hope you enjoy making this falcon this pattern has not been tested but i have donemy best to make sure all the information containedwithin is accurate if you encounter any problems at all myravelry username is junieluwho please feel freeto drop me a message have fun what you ll need yarn you can use any type of yarn but if you wantyour falcon to look like mine then use heartlandyarn in sequoia and for the claws and beak use touch of alpacain goldenrod hook i used an e hook which is -3 5mm wire 15 gauge aluminum wire or a thinner wire doubledover eyes 10mm safety eyes tapestry needle vocabulary chain chain increase increase 2sc in the same st st stitch single_crochet single_crochet round/round round fo fasten o� decrease decrease if you want your decrease to be a bit moreinvisible then you can replace the decrease with an invdec invisible decrease fl front loop blo back loop only yo yarn over skip skip magic_ring magic_ring if you don t know how to do a magicring you can replace it with ch2 and single_crochet in 2nd chfrom hook how to decrease put your hook in the next st yo and pull loopthrough repeat this one more time there shouldbe 3 loops on your hook pull through all of them invdec put your hook in the fl of the next st butdonotpull up a loop work your way into the flof the next st yo and pull through both fl yo and pullthrough both loops left on hook feet-legs the feet-legs are worked in both rnds and row cuta 16in tail of wire for the 1st leg but a 28in tailfor the 2nd note you may have to use more or less wiredepending on your gauge round 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring ~6 round 2 single_crochet chain 5 starting in the 2nd chain from hookslst 4aroundwire single_crochet chain 6 starting in the 2ndch from hook slip_stitch 5 around wire single_crochet chain 5 starting in the2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 around wire single_crochet 2 chain 5 startingin the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 around wire single_crochet~6 scs and4 toes single_crochet 2 around the wire towards the center of magic_ring round 3 row 1 chain 7 starting in the 2nd chain fromhook single_crochet 6 turn~6 row 2 chain 1 single_crochet 6 turn~6 row 3 chain 1 single_crochet 6 turn~6 row 4 chain 1 single_crochet 6 through both thelast row worked and the original 7 chain~6 round 4 in dark brown yarn chain 1 increase in each of thests around the top of the previous 4 row~8 fo on the tan yarn and use it to sew the lower legonto the foot place a st marker in the last st round 5 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet~11 round
